report.title: Newyear's Candyflip
report.author: Dextrose
report.bodytext: [21:00] /n Ingests 2 pills Vitamin-C (500 mg. in each, selfdosing over 12 hours), 2 pills Vitamin-B6 (30 mg. in each) and 150 mg. 5-HTP. /n /n [22:00] /n Arrives at some friends, starts drinking booze and beers (there were plenty of alcohol). /n /n [~22:30] /n Starts eating of them pills. (3 Diamonds, an EZ-test first turned orange, then pitch black - definitly MDMA, and probably also amphetamine). /n /n [~23:30] /n Party's on, everybody is totally drunk, loud and most of us are drugged too. /n /n [somewhere between 2 and 4] /n We take off 8-10 persons to a new-years psytrance party. /n /n [~45 mins. after] /n Arrives at the party, i don't remember details but it ruled, and i danced my ass off. /n /n [~5:45] /n A girl gives me 2 blotters (Condoms, very good LSD!), after i give her 10 mg. foxy methoxy. /n /n [~6:00] /n My friend doesn't hesitate to eat the one, i eat 3/4 of my blotter, and give the last quarter to a friend. (I had eaten the 3 pills at that time). /n /n [~6:45] /n We can't feel if the acid has kicked in, because we are pretty MDMA-fucked, so we each eat a capsule of 10 mg. foxy methoxy (5-MeO-DiPT) to kick in the acid... It was about that time i ate another 150 mg. 5-HTP. /n /n [~7:00] /n I go to take a piss, and notice some minor visual distortions, 30 seconds after while i'm pissing, the visuals are accelerating, and from that point i have the most beautifull visuals i've ever had, definitly from the acid, but with a little of the foxy-visuals mixed in. /n /n [~7:45] /n I take off from the party with a couple of friends. /n /n [~8:30-9:30] /n We arrive 3 persons at my place, my MDMA-buzz is still present, but now clearly much more dominated by the hallucinogens. /n I eat another 150 mg.'s of 5-HTP. /n /n ...we trip, talk, listens to music, and enjoys each others great friendly company. /n /n We order some food at about 8 pm., i go online to post something on a webboard, IRC's a little, logs off, and watches a movie with my friends. /n /n Sleeps at about 11 pm. /n /n Absolutely the best new years eve i had, a clear +++! /n Great music, good friends, nice set & setting, good drugs... /n /n I've been told that the blotters (Condoms) are 185 mic. each, wich i believe is true. [Erowid note: Nobody really knows] /n /n MDMA & LSD is wonderfull together, and the little fox on top of it, is a great combination - absolutely recommendable! /n /n /Dex
